item.theurgy.alchemical_sulfur.tooltip.e: Sulfur represents the "idea" or "soul" of an object and is the key to replication and transmutation.
item.theurgy.jar_label.tooltip: Dummy item for eay render access to Alchemical Sulfur labels.
message.theurgy..divination_rod.block_no: §4Warning§r: The divination rod cannot be attuned to this type of block: %s.
message.theurgy..divination_rod.linked: §aSuccess§r:The divination rod is now attuned to %s.
message.theurgy..divination_rod.no_link: The divination rod is not attuned to any material.
message.theurgy..divination_rod.tier_too: §4Warning§r: You need a higher tier divination rod to attune to %s.
